original_text: The entrance was ten cubits wide, and the projecting walls on each side of it were five cubits wide. He also measured the main hall; it was forty cubits long and twenty cubits wide.
korean_text: 그 문 통로의 너비는 열 척이요 문 통로 이쪽 벽의 너비는 다섯 척이요 저쪽 벽의 너비는 다섯 척이며 그가 성소를 측량하니 그 길이는 마흔 척이요 그 너비는 스무 척이며

sentences.original_text: The entrance was ten cubits wide
the projecting walls on each side of it were five cubits wide
sentences.korean_translation: 양쪽의 돌출된 벽은 다섯 규빗 너비였다

sentences.original_text: He also measured the main hall
